name: CliffLike bars
directions: Combine peanut butter and honey in a large nonstick pot and warm up over a low heat until runny and mixed.
Mix in the oatmeal (and protein powder, if using
You don't want to cook it, just heat it up enough to stir everything together nicely.
Press into a 9x9-inch pan, lined with parchment.
Let cool, then cut into 16 equal bars.
